snippet.title: Death the Guitar Trailer
snippet.description:
『Death the Guitar』はポップ＆バイオレンスな2D横スクロールアクションゲームです持ち主を殺された殺人エレキギターとなり、「音」と「電気」を操り人間たちへの復讐を目指します。

"Death the Guitar" is a pop and violent 2D Platformer action game. The player is a killer electric guitar whose owner was murdered, and the goal is to take revenge on the humans by manipulating "sound" and "electricity".

Steam Store Page:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2474220/Death_the_Guitar/

開発者：トロヤマイバッテリーズフライド
Developer: Toroya My Battery Is Fried
https://twitter.com/toroyakun
